reference.shortdesc: Display attributes is a parameter entity declaration in the topic DTD that includes attributes whose values may be used for affecting the display of a topic or its selection by search tools.

refbody.refsyn: Contained byUsed in fig, pre, lines, simpletable, and their derivatives.

example.p: The %display-atts; parameter entity is used within the DITA dtds as a common definition for attributes that affect presentation of certain elements. Not all of these capabilities have been provided yet for DITA topic processing. A typical example might be:
example.codeblock: <codeblock scale="90" frame="topbot" expanse="page"> /* a long sample program */ Do forever Say "Hello, World" End </codeblock>
